description: Wraps a dataset-like object as an instance of IterDataset, and equips it withmap and other utility methods. All non-magic methods of the raw objectalso accessible.

params.name: data
params.description: An object with __iter__ function. It can be a Iterable or asubclass of paddle.io.IterableDataset.

params.name: kwargs
params.description: Other information to be passed to the dataset.
